metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11662 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
The _WM_ParseNewMidi function in f_midi.c in WildMIDI 0.4.2 can cause adenial of service (invalid memory read and application crash) via a craftedmid file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11662` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwildmidi-config - 0.4.2-1
libwildmidi2 - 0.4.2-1
wildmidi - 0.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wildmidi package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.2-1').
